rules.natural: If the forest habitat is preserved, then conservation goals are met in the region.
Provided that the protection act legislation is passed, native species are protected in the region.
It is the case that either the protection act legislation is passed, or enforcement by the agency is effective.
Whenever enforcement by the agency is effective, funding is adequate for the program.
If monitoring is regular in the region, then invasive species are controlled in the region.
Under the condition that funding is adequate for the program, monitoring is regular in the region.
If the climate is stable in the region, then conservation goals are met in the region.
Either drought occurs in the region, or if the climate is not stable in the region, then the climate is changing in the region.
Provided that rainfall is sufficient in the region, drought does not occur in the region.
Rainfall is sufficient in the region, or water resources are managed in the region.
Under the condition that the wetland habitat is preserved, conservation goals are met in the region.
Provided that the awareness campaign is successful for the agency, then if public support is high in the community, conservation goals are met in the region.
If media coverage is positive by the outlets, then the awareness campaign is successful for the agency.
Under the condition that community engagement is high in the community, the awareness campaign is successful for the agency.
Whenever educational programs are effective in the schools, then either media coverage is positive by the outlets, or community engagement is high in the community.
Provided that volunteer participation is high in the community, then either media coverage is positive by the outlets, or community engagement is high in the community.
If grants are awarded by the foundation, then either educational programs are effective in the schools, or volunteer participation is high in the community.
It is the case that either grants are awarded by the foundation, or corporate sponsorship is secured from the companies.
Under the condition that corporate sponsorship is secured from the companies, then either educational programs are effective in the schools, or volunteer participation is high in the community.
Whenever zoning restrictions are imposed by the council, protected areas are designated in the region.
Under the condition that carbon emissions reduce in the nation, the international treaty is ratified by the nation.
Either carbon emissions reduce in the nation, or if the temperature is stable in the region, then if the climate is not stable in the region, the climate is changing in the region.
Whenever the irrigation system is modernized on the farms, soil moisture is maintained in the fields.
The irrigation system is modernized on the farms, or water conservation practices are adopted on the farms.
Provided that water conservation practices are adopted on the farms, drought does not occur in the region.
If sustainable agriculture is promoted in the region, then if soil moisture is maintained in the fields, drought does not occur in the region.
Whenever the ecosystem is balanced in the region, then either the forest habitat is preserved, or the wetland habitat is preserved.
Provided that organic farming increases in the region, pesticide use decreases in the region.
If organic farming increases in the region, then pesticide use does not decrease in the region.
Organic farming increases in the region, or chemical fertilizer use is not high on the farms.
If species thrive in the region, then the ecosystem is balanced in the region.
Provided that a conservation plan is implemented in the region, then if biodiversity increases in the region, species thrive in the region.
Whenever invasive species are controlled in the region, pollution does not increase in the region.
If it is not the case that if water resources are managed in the region then drought does not occur in the region, then there is a water shortage in the region.
Provided that it is not the case that if protected areas are designated in the region then industrial development does not expand in the region, economic growth slows in the region.
Under the condition that it is not the case that if seasonal patterns are normal in the region then the climate is stable in the region, an extreme weather event occurs in the region.

Whenever it is not the case that if it is not the case that if seasonal patterns are normal in the region then the climate is stable in the region, then an extreme weather event does not occur in the region, disaster relief is needed in the region.
If the climate is not stable in the region, then the climate is not changing in the region.
Under the condition that sustainable agriculture is not promoted in the region, chemical fertilizer use is high on the farms.
Whenever conservation goals are not met in the region, industrial development expands in the region.
If conservation goals are not met in the region, then zoning restrictions are imposed by the council.
Provided that conservation goals are not met in the region, pollution increases in the region.
